value.description: The ApprovalInstance items on this page

ApprovalInstanceProperties.description: RP-specific properties of an ApprovalInstance resource

approvalDefinitionId.description: The ARM resource ID of the ApprovalDefinition resource that the ApprovalInstance was created from.

requestedBy.description: The one who attempted to make the change that triggered the ApprovalInstance.

requestedFor.description: The ARM resource ID of the change that the ApprovalInstance was associated with.

requestedDateTime.description: The datetime when the ApprovalInstance was triggered.

changeManifest.description: The change manifest associated with the ApprovalInstance, free-formed and could be base64 encoded.

approvalRule.description: The rule about how the approval workflow can be successfully completed, originated from the ApprovalDefinition resource at the time the ApprovalInstance was created

state.description: The current state of the approval instance.

stageStatuses.description: The latest status of each stage.

verificationAuthoritySignoffs.description: The signoffs that verify authority sign

ApprovalInstancePropertiesUpdate.description: RP-specific properties of an ApprovalInstance resource

approvalDefinitionId.description: The ARM resource ID of the ApprovalDefinition resource that the ApprovalInstance was created from.

requestedBy.description: The one who attempted to make the change that triggered the ApprovalInstance.

requestedFor.description: The ARM resource ID of the change that the ApprovalInstance was associated with.

requestedDateTime.description: The datetime when the ApprovalInstance was triggered.

changeManifest.description: The change manifest associated with the ApprovalInstance, free-formed and could be base64 encoded.

approvalRule.description: The rule about how the approval workflow can be successfully completed, originated from the ApprovalDefinition resource at the time the ApprovalInstance was created

state.description: The current state of the approval instance.

stageStatuses.description: The latest status of each stage.

verificationAuthoritySignoffs.description: The signoffs that verify authority sign

values.name: InProgress
values.description: The approval workflow instance has started.

values.name: Satisfied
values.description: The approval workflow instance has finished with all approval rules satisfied.

values.name: Dissatisfied
values.description: The approval workflow instance has ended without approval rules satisfied.

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

values.name: InProgress
values.description: The approval request in still in progress.

values.name: Approved
values.description: The approval request has been approved.

values.name: Rejected
values.description: The approval request has been rejected.

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

ApprovalResultListResult.description: The response of a ApprovalResult list operation.

value.description: The ApprovalResult items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

ApprovalResultProperties.description: RP-specific properties of an ApprovalResult resource

approvalRequestState.description: The current state the approval request.

ApprovalRule.description: Rule about how an approval workflow can be successfully completed.

stageDefinitions.description: The definitions of all the stages in the approval workflow.

proof.description: The signature against the approval rule to prove its authenticity.

ledgerRecord.description: The reference to the confidential ledger record about the rule.

ApprovalRuleUpdate.description: Rule about how an approval workflow can be successfully completed.

stageDefinitions.description: The definitions of all the stages in the approval workflow.

proof.description: The signature against the approval rule to prove its authenticity.

ledgerRecord.description: The reference to the confidential ledger record about the rule.

name.description: The name of the stage, unique within a single ApprovalDefinition resource

dependsOn.description: The logic rules in JSON about how the stage depends on other stages.

approvers.description: The set of approvers in the stage.

quorum.description: The minimal number of approvals for completing the stage.

values.name: Created
values.description: The initial state of the approval stage.

values.name: Started
values.description: The approval stage is ready to accept signoffs.

values.name: Completed
values.description: The approval stage has finished with approval rules satisfied.

values.name: Terminated
values.description: The approval stage has ended without approval rules satisfied.

signoffs.description: The resource ids of ApproverSignoffs submitted in the stage.

items.description: A type definition that refers the id to an Azure Resource Manager resource.

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

values.name: Pending
values.description: The approver hasn't take any action.

value.description: The ApproverSignoff items on this page

approvalDefinitionId.description: The ARM resource ID of the ApprovalDefinition resource that the ApproverSignoff was created from.

approver.description: The one who took the signoff action.

stageName.description: The name of the approval stage from where the signoff was originated.

signoffDateTime.description: The datetime when the approver took the signoff action.

signoffManifest.description: The content of which the signoff is about, free-formed and could be base64 encoded.

signatures.description: The signatures from the approvers for the signoff, could be base64 encoded

ledgerRecord.description: The reference to the confidential ledger record about the signoff.

signatures.description: The signatures from the approvers for the signoff, could be base64 encoded
